column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/adb72ea9a104cb12c73ed4e41b05ad633d24bdc3 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

In general I agree with this, but be careful:
- `tidy_datadir.sh` is not specifically a developer tool, it is generally useful for anyone that upgrades from old versions of Bitcoin
- `qt_translations.py` is mentioned in the release process, update the path there too
Noted. Going to tackle this a different way. \n
